actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., or +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage if used with both hands to make a melee attack, or 6 (1d6 + 3) if thrown.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The morphoi can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Immunity to Temporal Effects
special_abilities.desc: The morphoi is immune to all time-related spells and effects.

special_abilities.name: Shapeshifter
special_abilities.desc: The morphoi can use its action to polymorph into a Medium creature or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment the morphoi is carrying or wearing isn't transformed. The morphoi reverts to its true form when it dies.
